content.question: Two identical resistors, an uncharged capacitor, and a switch are connected to a battery in the circuit shown above. Which of the following correctly compares the potential difference across resistor <math alttext="R 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> before and after the switch is closed and explains the comparison?
